Package system.data.oledb

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IOleDbInfoMessageEventHandler
    The Java interface to be implemented to receive events from the CLR using OleDbInfoMessageEventHandler.
    IOleDbRowUpdatedEventHandler
    The Java interface to be implemented to receive events from the CLR using OleDbRowUpdatedEventHandler.
    IOleDbRowUpdatingEventHandler
    The Java interface to be implemented to receive events from the CLR using OleDbRowUpdatingEventHandler.
